short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives you info on the vocaloid song you're listening to (data from vocadb.net)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that gives you some information on the current vocaloid song you're listening to with data from vocadb.net. Just click on the icon!
Not affiliated with vocacb
